name: Harlequin Neckpiece
description:
Heavy with silver, yet comfortable to wear, this neckpiece comes in a choice of two shapes (pear drop or diamond).  PLEASE NOTE: the picture shown is two neckpieces, not one, and they are sold individually!  The pendant is decorated with a textured hexagonal pattern.

I make this item to order, so please allow up to 7 working days prior to postage.

Materials: Sterling silver pendant on a chunky sterling silver wire choker, which is shaped to the contours of the neckline.

Shipping:
This item is shipped by registered post only.

name: Tint Earrings 1
description:
Gorgeous earrings with a burst of colour!  These little beauties are made in sterling silver, and filled with colourful felt.  The felt is held in place with wire, as I refuse to use glue in my work.  Your choice of colour: bright red, burgundy, sky blue, turquoise, pale yellow.

I make these earrings to order so please allow up to 7 working days prior to postage.

Post and packaging:
All items are individually gift wrapped and sent by standard mail. If you would prefer registered maiI, please let me know when you make your purchase.  I will invoice you separately for the additional amount using PayPal, which you must pay before I send the item.  Please see “Shop Policies” for registered mail prices.

name: Vertex earrings
description:
Sterling silver ear studs from the "Vertex Collection". The inside comes oxidised (blackened), or left silver on request.

I hand make these unique earrings to order, and the price is reflected in the amount of time I spend at the workbench. Please allow up to 2 weeks before postage.

Earrings sent registered post only (see Policies for details). All items purchased come individually gift wrapped.

name: Vertex - Silver Bangle
description:
I describe this unique bangle as a wearable sculpture! Made entirely from sterling silver, but suprisingly light. The points of each pentagon are slightly rounded for comfort. The bangle pictured has a silver finish on the outside, and an oxidised (blackened) finish on the inside.

This item is made to order. Please allow up to 3 weeks prior to postage. I order the silver in specially, which adds to the time I take to make it. The price reflects the cost of silver and the hours spent making.

OPTIONS:
The bangle is sold with a standard inner diameter of approx 20cm, but can be made to any size. Let me know your size when placing your order. Measure your bangle size by running a dressmakers tape around the inside of a circular bangle that fits you well, making sure that it can slip over your hand. The bangle looks quite chunky when worn, so suits a bigger wrist.

The bangle is sold with a silver finish outside/oxidised finish inside. Let me know if you would prefer no oxidising.

POST AND PACKAGING:
Due to the price of this item, it is shipped by registered post only (see policies for details). All items purchased come individually gift wrapped.

Photo by Andrew Barcham.

name: Octagonal Cushion Ring
description:
Luxuriously heavy with sterling silver and finished with either an oxidised or brushed silver finish.
Available in (UK) SIZE: P
Outer dimensions: 22 (h) x 22 (w) x 11.8 (d) mm

Contact me to custom order other sizes.
Click "View Shop Policies" for information on ring size conversion.

Shipping:
Items are shipped by standard post within 3-5 working days. If you would prefer registered shipping please let me know by completing the “note to buyer” section of the payment page. I will invoice you separately for the additional amount using PayPal, which you must pay before I send the item. 
·Registered post within the UK = an additional £3.80 (total £5.80)
·Registered post to other countries = an additional £6.00 (total £11.00)

Wrapping:
All items purchased are individually gift wrapped.

name: 9ct Gold Octagonal ring
description:

Available in (Australian) sizes:
L1/2, M, M1/2, N, N1/2, O
Click "View Shop Policies" for information on ring size conversion.

Satin/brushed
High polish

To specify ring size and finish, please send me a message when you place your order using the "contact the shop owner" button.

Shipping:
Due to the value of 9ct gold, I ship this item by registered post only.

Wrapping:
All items purchased are individually gift wrapped.

name: Boat ring
description:
Handmade in sterling silver square wire, this ring is shaped in an elipse that is curved upwards at each end (giving it the name "boat ring"). Simple, lightweight and comfortable, yet striking to wear.

name: Pyramid ring
description:
Handmade sterling silver ring from the "Vertex Collection". An octagonal ring shank is topped with a half dodecahedron containing a 5 sided pyramid, and is designed to look like a geometric flower. The ring comes partially oxidised (blackened) on the inside.

This little labour of love is handmade to order and takes a while to make. The time I spend at the workbench is reflected in the cost. Please allow up to 3 WEEKS before postage. It is well worth the wait!

Ring size O 1/2 (Australian sizing). Please see Terms for details of ring size conversion.

Ring shipped by registered pots only (see Policies for details).  All items purchased are individually gift wrapped.

name: Fan Tail Brooch with Korean Inlay
description:
Item handmade to order (this is a complex piece to make, so please allow up to three (3) weeks prior to postage)

Front: mild steel, fine silver
Back: sterling silver, stainless steel pin
Approx dimensions: 60 (h) x 45 (w) x 7 (d) mm

For a custom bird design or size please contact me prior to placing your order.

Brooch sent registered post only (see Policies for details). All items purchased come individually gift wrapped. 

Korean inlay is an historical technique in which fine silver is pressed in to a cross hatched ground, made from hundreds of tiny strokes with a small chisel. Because of the organic nature of this technique each brooch is slightly unique from the next, making them all the more special. The price reflects the time it takes to make this little birdy. 

All items purchased are individually gift wrapped.
